Bases: object

Class that handles gameplay

Handles the gameplay.

Sets players and sets “track” surface for them. :param list players: list of players

set_powerups(powerups)¶

Activates or deactivates powerups in game. :param bool powerups: bool value to activate or deactivate powerups

fever.message_display(text, surface, font_size, color)¶

Displays text in the middle of the screen :param str text: text to display :param surface: surface for the text to be displayed on :param font_size: font size of the text :param color: color of the text
